documents.document: @mcgregor_ewan @piersmorgan Good on you Ewan. Can't believe that idiot is still allowed airtime.

Thank you again #nzsecretsanta . Perfect. Well needed today to deal with an excited 2 year old. Merry Christmas https://t.co/ks7AyPHiNC
Gearing up for my last shift before Christmas. May the Patron of Bar workers save me from an onslaught of amateurs. @Bar_staff_probs
My #nzsecretsanta has arrived - the right one this time. Thanks to @tinanz for sending it on. Back under the tree. Thanks again Santa.
@tinanz no worries. Have a great Christmas & New Year.
@tinanz Hi, think we were the ones mixed up in the #nzsecretsanta . Just to let you know I've posted yours off today.
Seems a mix up, I have someone else's #nzsecretsanta & they have mine. Thanks to the team for trying to sort it. Super sleuths!
My #nzsecretsanta is here. Thank you Santa. It's under the tree till Xmas Day. I hope Santa is good to you too. https://t.co/rLQrkAzHYv
Rewatching #Sherlock on @UKTVnz and cannot wait for new episodes in January. Cannot wait!
@RyanJonesOnline Suits you , Ryan. New career?
@nzsecretsanta thanks for all your hard work guys. Awesome work.
Panic over. My gift has arrived at the storehouse. #nzsecretsanta #phew
@WelshRugbyUnion Do you guys have confirmed dates for the Pacific tour tests yet? Can't find anything online.
@nzsecretsanta Bit concerned my pressie sent on Friday is still not showing up as received. Is there a backlog to update?
@ardrigh Sure is. Happy with the others but not sold on Howley.
Well that's exciting. Thank you to my #nzsecretsanta. https://t.co/ErfEgFjxJv
3 days off in a row from work and plenty of sleep. This is what energy feels like again. #gettingshitdone #it'llbegonebytomorrow
@Chantal_Patton thanks. I hope it continues in the same way.
What a birthday morning: A lie-in, I repeat, A lie-in; 2 cups of tea in bed and a bag of Galaxy Minstrels. #happydays
Wonderful afternoon at Government House listening to Christmas Carol concert. Congratulations to all involved, excellent #Wellington
That's my @nzsecretsanta gift sent off to the elves for another year. Not the easiest this year, hopefully they'll enjoy. #nzsecretsanta
"@BBC_Travel: Spa theme park to open in Japan featuring hot-spring rollercoaster. https://t.co/VR4v6AXKnR @suzienewshoes amazing.
@YGathGoch Much needed after the earlier laptop drama. Nothing a Roast, fresh bread and wine can't fix
Roast Beef dinner in the oven, bread rising by the window. Taking a moment with a glass of vino and this view. https://t.co/ZEUGGKAorg
@YGathGoch Diolch. Will check them out.
Spectacularly managed to break the laptop today. FML. Any ideas if its worth repairing or buying new? #laptopadvice #clumsyfool #wellington
@nzsecretsanta To bake my own bread. Pretty happy, only bought about 5 shop loaves this year. Still learning & experimenting.
@PontypriddRFC Come on the Pont. #OleOleOle
Had 3 events to choose to go to tonight, either 1 or all 3. I chose this & the sofa. #Getting on #Chianti https://t.co/trwTYrv2VE
@UKinNZ what time is it finishing?
Great, if not wet, morning at @WellingtonZoo. Running after this one chasing kangaroos and chickens. https://t.co/fVw20po6hp
@WestPlazaNZ Do you need to book if coming for breakfast?
@PSSRemovals Great. Think you guys will need to follow me for me to send a DM
@lyallbaynz Will get in my list for a visit soon. Thanks
Earthquakes, aftershocks, torrential rain, floods & Tornadoes. Another tragedy is we're out of good tea. SOS: Someone help @YorkshireTea
@lyallbaynz looks great. Where's that?

What is the best novel to read in a pub?
https://t.co/RDcgoEMPg6 Think mine would be Sherlock - preferably by a fire on a stormy night.

"@geonet: A brief update: we've had 251 eqs since 7 p.m. last night. A total of 780 eqs since the M7.5 Kaikoura Quake. #eqnz" I blame Trump.
After a quick visit to the supermarket the shelves most in demand were water, toilet paper and chocolate. Personally I went for Wine. #eqnz
@SparkNZ Great touch
@Panderys83 @suzienewshoes yes all ok here thankfully.

@Panderys83 could do with that now! Lush.
@ardrigh what is the entertainment or do I not want to know? 😂. Waiting for Suze to get home then I'll be down. Prob midnight ish

@ardrigh haha. And they are all about 2-5 miles of where I'm from. Classy.

@ardrigh bit gutted now

@ardrigh we'll be screwed mate.

Lovely meal @Portlander_ last night, compliments to the chefs and rest of the service staff. Excellent .

@Panderys83 Lol, i think it's still in the garden out the back yard.

Thank you to my #nzsecretsanta , I loved them and enjoying already. Merry Christmas to you. X
@Panderys83 yep free anytime.
@Panderys83 @suzienewshoes thanks my lovely. Scorchio here today. Drinking white wine in the sun. Happy Xmas eve! X
Thank you to my #nzsecretsanta! Loved the presents and enjoying them already. Merry Christmas to you, hope Santa brings what you wanted. X
Insomnia 1 - Me 0. Not going to be the relaxing Xmas eve I hoped for, manic day ahead. #stupidbrain
"@salvationarmyuk: Will you back #Shaky4Number1 this Christmas https://t.co/mAjTF2S5cu" @Panderys83 has shaky got a new 1?
@lauramcgoldrick @RadioHaurakiNZ Boo! Sad times! Best of luck with your next venture
My #nzsecretsanta gift had arrived but im going to save opening until Christmas Day. Thanks again to my secret Santa! #gettinginthemood
Great night last night @CircaTheatre watching a child's Christmas in Wales. Highly recommend seeing it. Wonderful performance by Ray Henwood
@Panderys83 playing best of 3 in the car. Almost went straight out with 2 shockers, saved by Chris Rea. #drivinghomeforchristmas

My faith had been restored and seeing @nzsecretsanta has been sent.Thank you! Good start to the day. Xmas tunes in work tonight me thinks
For the 1st time it looks like I won't be receiving a @nzsecretsanta this year. Hopefully Sion Corn remembers. #allaboutthegiving #yeahright
@Panderys83 Home alone on the TV and THAT song is on #bettergetamoveon
Great afternoon at the Scandinavian Christmas @CapitalENZ , thanks for putting it on, we all loved it.
@worldmarket_nz Asap if you can get it? Cheers guys. #isitonly2weeks?
Sent my @nzsecretsanta off. Was very odd buying for a teenager obsessed with 1D. Time to start trimming up the house and pub now.

@nzsecretsanta any Sherlock Holmes black and white, Casablanca, its a wonderful life. Most Xmas films.
@nzsecretsanta 1. Northern lights 2. Run my own business
@nzsecretsanta Victorian London. I love the thought of living (affluently) there at that time.
Some serious Wellington wind out there today. I'll be hunkering down by the fire with few glasses of @MtDifficulty pinot noir. #summer
Great day in the sun, now off for a meal at the Rockyard - 1st time there. Maybe be a cheeky pint at the @WelshDragonBar after. #goodtimes
Daddy daycare day, best day of the week. What's going on today in #wellington for me and a small person?

@ardrigh good to see you again mate. Catch up soon.
Back in the homeland for a few weeks and looking forward to a day at @PontypriddRFC
